post:
ErrantWeb has been a high quality virtual private server provider since January of 2012. We provide the amazing services at amazing prices! We have a 3-Day Money Back Guarantee on any of our services, if your not satisfied in anyway just open a ticket and we will send a refund back. However we do think you'll be satisfied. Here are our offers for you:

**LET-256MB -DET- Order Link:** https://www.errantweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=36
-25GB Storage
-256MB Ram
-128MB vSwap
-100GB Bandwidth
-1 vCPU Core
-OpenVZ
-Metro-Detroit Location @ Waveform
-Fast Setup
Price: $2.50/m - No coupon needed.

**LET-512MB -DET- Order Link:** https://www.errantweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=37
-50GB Storage
-512MB Ram
-256MB vSwap
-150GB Bandwidth
-1 vCPU Core
-OpenVZ
-Metro-Detroit Location  @ Waveform
-Fast Setup
Price: $5.00/m  - No coupon needed.

**LET-1024MB -DET- Order Link:** https://www.errantweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=38
-100GB Storage
-1024MB Ram
-512MB vSwap
-200GB Bandwidth
-1 vCPU Core
-OpenVZ
-Metro-Detroit Location  @ Waveform
-Fast Setup
Price: $7.00/m  - No coupon needed.

**LET-1024MB-KCIT- Order Link:** https://www.errantweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=39
-5GB SSD Storage
-1024MB Ram
-512MB vSwap
-500GB Bandwidth
-1 vCPU Core
-OpenVZ
-Kansas City
-Fast Setup
Price: $7.00/m  - No coupon needed.

**Test Detroit IP:** det.errantweb.com
**Test Kansas City IP:** kcit.errantweb.com

All orders ( unless you already have a active order ) will be subject to a manual review by a admin at ErrantWeb, this is to verify that we have a real order and not a fraudulent one. We take a lot of pride by having great clients. If we see anything that does not look correct you will be called for verification, and then if you cannot take a phone call your order will be denied and you will be refunded.

Worried about issues with vSwap? We're not, we have been running vSwap on all of our services since launch, we have experienced no issues with it and we don't think you will either. If you do have a issue you are always open to our 3-Day Money Back Guarantee.

**Have Questions?**
Email: sales@errantweb.com
Skype: ErrantWeb
Ticket: https://errantweb.com/client/submitticket.php
Live Chat: We have live chat at the top right of the site.
